Subject: Abomination

Content-Type: text/plain; charset=us-ascii
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
From: robertdahl <rdahl@...>

The huge Decepticon continued to strain across the ocean floor, dragging
behind him the huge space shuttle that had been embedded into the Azores
islands. His massive hands denting the hull as he pulled it against the
ocean floor. He went about his task in utter silence, his face showing
no emotion, just a neutral mask, as he did what the words repeated in
his head. "Just drag the ship in that direction." it told him. He could
barely comprehend the sentence but once he began to pull it, his
instincts kicked in, and all of his raw power, his hydrolics burned
energy for this one task, using the current and density of the water to
his advantage to lift the impossibly huge object.
